en-US.summary: Search the NCI Dictionary of Cancer Terms for words related to cancer and medicine.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask sapient cancer dictionary to define breast cancer.
Alexa, ask sapient cancer dictionary what is leukemia?
Alexa, ask sapient cancer dictionary what is colorectal cancer?
en-US.name: Sapient Cancer Dictionary
en-US.description:
Search the National Cancer Institute Dictionary of Cancer Terms for definitions of words related to cancer and medicine.

To open the application say:
"Alexa, Open Sapient Cancer."

To receive a definition use one of the phrases:

"Alexa,  What is ______?" or "Alexa, define ______."

For example:
"Alexa, what is colon cancer?"
"Alexa, define leukemia."

--The National Cancer Institute (NCI) is the federal government’s principal agency for cancer research and train

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
In order to test this skill try the following:

Step 1: Open the skill 

 "Alexa open sapient cancer"



Step 2:  Ask for a term or definition

"Alexa define leukemia." 

"Alexa what is lung cancer?"

Step 3: Exit the skill

"Alexa, exit.”

"Alexa, quit.”
